Text:
This sure is a dumb way to create a torrent.

In the future, I recommend that you create a separate torrent for each movie that you want to share.
Please start to seed some more man!
Only a douchebag creates such kind of torrent. Noone will seed this for long. Next time make one torrent per movie.
hey guys, it's not necessary to download all of them at the same time. You can select what movie you want from the option list
